author: Staff Reporter
text:
The Madurai Zonal-level foot-ball competitions for the Chief Minister’s Cup will be held in Kanyakumari district from Wednesday to Friday, says a release from Collector here on Sunday.

The foot-ball matches for boys will be held at the Arignar Anna Stadium in Nagercoil and for girls, the competitions will be held in Holy Cross College ground.

Those who had been selected in the district-level competitions in Madurai, Kanyakumari, Ramanathapuram, Theni, Virudhunagar, Thoothukudi, Tirunelveli and Sivaganga districts will be participating in the competitions.

The top two teams will be taken to Chennai for State-level competitions. The members of the winning team in State-level match would be given Rs.1 lakh each and the second prize would be Rs.75,000 each and the third prize would be Rs.50,000, the release added.
title: Zonal-level football competitions for CM’s cup from Wednesday
